channel.title: He Man Haters Show http://myspace.com/hemanhaters
channel.description:
"Whoop There is it" (There it aint!)
The He Man Haters Show will consist of information/ sex education, News, Interviews (starts at 9pm, call ins, and on-site interviews.
Band interviews including pictures. Always comment on music first and them what the band members look like and rate them on a do-able scale 0-10.
Woman on bikes
Fashion
Add to "Burn Book"
Thanks
VitalPodcasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: He Man Haters Radio Show : adult content warning!!!!

item.title: He Man Haters Show : BEST OF SHOW
item.description: He Man Haters Show : BEST OF SHOW Wow, it is really hard to put together a best of show when each episode could be strung together. But I found a few cool segments that I thought would make you laugh for almost 2 hours. We have the interview with "The Tongue (Patrick), Does Size Matter, and the interview with Chris Caffery

item.title: HE MAN HATERS SHOW #12 Does Size Matter?
item.description: HE MAN HATERS SHOW #12 Does Size Matter? Does size matter, Clone of Willy, calls from Kevin, Robert, Chris and Domonic.

item.title: HE MAN HATERS SHOW #11 INTERVIEW WITH CHRIS CAFFERY (TSO / SAVATAGE)
item.description: HE MAN HATERS SHOW #11 INTERVIEW WITH CHRIS CAFFERY (TSO / SAVATAGE) Kellie and Joanne get the infamous Chris Caffery on the show to discuss on the road, touring, the old rocker days of drinking to the evolution of the modern day Chris Caffery. Great interview!
item.dc:creator: He Man Haters Show
item.itunes:summary:
HE MAN HATERS SHOW #11 INTERVIEW WITH CHRIS CAFFERY (TSO / SAVATAGE)
Kellie and Joanne get the infamous Chris Caffery on the show to discuss on the road, touring, the old rocker days of drinking to the evolution of the modern day Chris Caffery.
Great interview!

item.title: He Man Hater Show #10 : KELLIE AND JOANNE / CALL IN BY THE
item.description: Review of UNN, Maximum Threshold Show previously clips. The Tongue (Patrick) calls in and tries to be funny but the women keep him in his place. HMH reached an all time download for shows in 1 day, awaiting Chris Caffery next week interview, Funny show! Music played: Chris Caffery - Pisses me off, Sweaty Johnson, Freevil - Deathblow, Stymeed - Down on the Ground, Diecast - These Days, Hot Action Cop - Club Slut and Fever for the Flava, plus much more!
